prompt: A mystical cosmic scene showcasing a whimsical Star Crystal Amulet. The amulet is adorned with small, twinkling stars and surrounded by a soft, ethereal glow. Floating gently in space, this celestial artifact is bathed in the subtle light of distant constellations and cosmic dust. The background features softly glowing nebulae and faint celestial bodies, adding to the enchanting, otherworldly atmosphere. The overall art style is bright and ethereal, with detailed cosmic elements and an otherworldly, whimsical charm.
